segments.text: Well now that I know what kind of movies you like , tell me , what's your least favorite kind of movie ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't really like sci-fi movies because they're always really weird .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know ! I don't get them at all . But wait , isn't ' Terminator ' a sci-fi movie ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm ... you're right . Well , I guess ' Terminator ' is an exception to the rule .
segments.speaker: S2
